tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository with necessary configurations for the VANA Agent-Tool Integration Architecture redesign.
tasks.details: Create a new repository with a README.md, .gitignore, and basic project structure. Include configuration files for Playwright testing and Google ADK integration. Use Node.js (v18+) and npm (v9+) for package management.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify repository setup by cloning it and running initial npm install to ensure all configurations are correct.

tasks.title: Root Cause Analysis
tasks.description: Analyze the root causes of the architectural mismatch between Agent Zero and Google ADK.
tasks.details: Document the issues identified in the PRD, including instruction overload, wrong implementation patterns, and model misconfiguration. Use Google ADK documentation to validate findings.
tasks.testStrategy: Review the analysis document to ensure all root causes are accurately identified and aligned with Google ADK best practices.

tasks.title: Test Simplified Instruction
tasks.description: Investigate and resolve memory/timeout issues during application startup that were previously misdiagnosed as instruction complexity problems.
tasks.details: Root cause analysis revealed WORKER TIMEOUT and memory issues during application initialization. Need to: 1) Profile memory usage during startup, 2) Identify hanging imports or initialization processes, 3) Optimize Cloud Run memory allocation, 4) Fix FastAPI 'send' argument issue.
tasks.testStrategy: Monitor Cloud Run logs for memory usage and timeout errors during startup. Compare performance before and after optimizations using both memory profiling tools and Playwright integration tests.

tasks.title: Document Architectural Requirements
tasks.description: Create a detailed document outlining the memory and startup optimization requirements for Cloud Run deployment.
tasks.details: Include requirements for: 1) Memory profiling and optimization, 2) Startup time reduction, 3) Import dependency analysis, 4) Cloud Run resource optimization, 5) Lazy loading implementation. Focus on fixing Cloud Run memory/timeout issues rather than architectural redesign.
tasks.testStrategy: Review the document with infrastructure team to ensure all optimization requirements are captured and feasible for Cloud Run environment.

tasks.title: Implement Minimal ADK-Compliant Instruction
tasks.description: Develop a minimal, focused instruction that adheres to Google ADK patterns.
tasks.details: Ensure the instruction is under 100 lines and follows Google ADK examples. Use Node.js and Google ADK SDK for implementation.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate the instruction using Playwright and ensure it meets the success criteria (100% integration success rate).

tasks.title: Create Memory Hierarchy Tools
tasks.description: Implement the memory hierarchy as modular tools instead of embedding it in instructions.
tasks.details: Develop tools for memory management using Node.js and Google ADK SDK. Ensure each tool is modular and reusable.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each tool individually and in combination with the minimal instruction to verify functionality.

tasks.title: Build Specialist Delegation System
tasks.description: Implement specialist delegation logic using sub-agents.
tasks.details: Create sub-agents for specialist tasks, ensuring they follow Google ADK patterns. Use Node.js and Google ADK SDK for implementation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test delegation workflows to ensure seamless integration with the main agent.

tasks.title: Implement Proactive Behavior Patterns
tasks.description: Modularize complex behaviors into separate tools for proactive actions.
tasks.details: Develop tools for proactive behaviors, ensuring they are modular and reusable. Use Node.js and Google ADK SDK.
tasks.testStrategy: Test proactive behaviors in isolation and in combination with other tools.

tasks.title: Add Orchestration Capabilities
tasks.description: Implement orchestration features to manage agent coordination.
tasks.details: Develop orchestration tools using Node.js and Google ADK SDK. Ensure they integrate with memory hierarchy and specialist delegation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test orchestration workflows to verify seamless agent coordination.

tasks.title: Comprehensive Playwright Testing
tasks.description: Perform end-to-end testing using Playwright to validate the entire system.
tasks.details: Create automated test scripts for all workflows, including memory hierarchy, specialist delegation, proactive behaviors, and orchestration.
tasks.testStrategy: Run Playwright tests and compare results with baseline metrics to ensure all success criteria are met.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize the system for performance and efficiency.
tasks.details: Analyze performance metrics and optimize tool implementations. Use Node.js profiling tools and Google ADK performance guidelines.
tasks.testStrategy: Re-run Playwright tests to verify performance improvements.

tasks.title: Production Deployment
tasks.description: Deploy the redesigned system to production.
tasks.details: Follow Google ADK deployment best practices to roll out the system. Ensure all configurations are production-ready.
tasks.testStrategy: Monitor production metrics to ensure the system meets all success criteria.
